verses.verse: So all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> was enrolled <S%H3187><s%> by genealogies; <S%H3187><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> they are written <S%H3789><s%> in the Book <S%H5612><s%> of the Kings <S%H4428><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> And Judah <S%H3063><s%> was carried <S%H1540><s%> away <S%H1540><s%> into exile <S%H1540><s%> to Babylon <S%H894><s%> for their unfaithfulness. <S%H4604><s%>

Now the first <S%H7223><s%> who <S%H834><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in their possessions <S%H272><s%> in their cities <S%H5892><s%> [were] Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the priests, <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> and the temple <S%H5411><s%> servants. <S%H5411><s%>

And some <S%H4480><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> and of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%>

Uthai <S%H5793><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud, <S%H5989><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Omri, <S%H6018><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Imri, <S%H566><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bani, <S%H1137><s%> from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Perez <S%H6557><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Judah. <S%H3063><s%>
And from the Shilonites <S%H7888><s%> [were] Asaiah <S%H6222><s%> the first-born and his sons. <S%H1121><s%>
And from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%> [were] Jeuel <S%H3262><s%> and their relatives, <S%H251><s%> 690 [of them.]

And from the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> [were] Sallu <S%H9365><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshullam, <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hodaviah, <S%H1938><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hassenuah, <S%H5574><s%>

and Ibneiah <S%H2997><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham, <S%H3395><s%> and Elah <S%H425><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uzzi, <S%H5813><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Michri, <S%H4381><s%> and Meshullam <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shephatiah, <S%H8203><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuel, <S%H7467><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ibnijah; <S%H2998><s%>

and their relatives <S%H251><s%> according to their generations, <S%H8435><s%> 956. All <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> [were] heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers' [households] according to their fathers' houses. <S%H1004><s%>
And from the priests <S%H3548><s%> [were] Jedaiah, <S%H3048><s%> Jehoiarib, <S%H3080><s%> Jachin, <S%H3199><s%>

and Azariah <S%H5838><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hilkiah, <S%H2518><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshullam, <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zadok, <S%H6659><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meraioth, <S%H4812><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahitub, <S%H285><s%> the chief <S%H5057><s%> officer <S%H5057><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God; <S%H430><s%>

and Adaiah <S%H5718><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham, <S%H3395><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pashhur, <S%H6583><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Malchijah, <S%H4441><s%> and Maasai <S%H4640><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Adiel, <S%H5717><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jahzerah, <S%H3170><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshullam, <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshillemith, <S%H4919><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Immer; <S%H564><s%>

and their relatives, <S%H251><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> 1760 very able <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> for the work <S%H4399><s%> of the service <S%H5656><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

And of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> [were] Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hasshub, <S%H2815><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azrikam, <S%H5840><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hashabiah, <S%H2811><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari; <S%H4847><s%>

and Bakbakkar, <S%H1230><s%> Heresh <S%H2792><s%> and Galal <S%H1559><s%> and Mattaniah <S%H4983><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mica, <S%H4316><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zichri, <S%H2147><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph, <S%H623><s%>

and Obadiah <S%H5662><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shemaiah, <S%H8098><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Galal, <S%H1559><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeduthun, <S%H3038><s%> and Berechiah <S%H1296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Asa, <S%H609><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Elkanah, <S%H511><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in the villages <S%H9161><s%> of the Netophathites. <S%H5200><s%>

Now the gatekeepers <S%H7778><s%> [were] Shallum <S%H7967><s%> and Akkub <S%H6126><s%> and Talmon <S%H2929><s%> and Ahiman <S%H289><s%> and their relatives <S%H251><s%> (Shallum <S%H7967><s%> the chief <S%H7218><s%>

[being stationed] until <S%H5704><s%> now <S%H2008><s%> at the king's gate <S%H8179><s%> to the east <S%H4217><s%>). These <S%H1992><s%> [were] the gatekeepers <S%H7778><s%> for the camp <S%H4264><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi. <S%H3878><s%>

And Shallum <S%H7967><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kore, <S%H6981><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebiasaph, <S%H43><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> and his relatives, <S%H251><s%> of his father's house, <S%H1004><s%> the Korahites, <S%H7145><s%> [were] over <S%H5921><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> of the service, <S%H5656><s%> keepers <S%H8104><s%> of the thresholds <S%H5592><s%> of the tent; <S%H168><s%> and their fathers had been over <S%H1><s%> the camp <S%H5921><s%> of the Lord, <S%H4264><s%> keepers <S%H3068><s%> of the entrance. <S%H8104><s%>
And Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> was ruler <S%H5057><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> them previously, <S%H6440><s%> [and] the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was with him.
Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshelemiah <S%H4920><s%> was gatekeeper <S%H7778><s%> of the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting. <S%H4150><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> these who were chosen <S%H1305><s%> to be gatekeepers <S%H7778><s%> in the thresholds <S%H5592><s%> were 212. These <S%H1992><s%> were enrolled <S%H3187><s%> by genealogy <S%H3187><s%> in their villages, <S%H9161><s%> whom <S%H1992><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> and Samuel <S%H8050><s%> the seer <S%H9536><s%> appointed <S%H3245><s%> in their office of trust. <S%H530><s%>

So they and their sons <S%H1121><s%> had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> [even] the house <S%H1004><s%> of the tent, <S%H168><s%> as guards. <S%H4931><s%>
The gatekeepers <S%H7778><s%> were on the four <S%H702><s%> sides, <S%H7307><s%> to the east, <S%H4217><s%> west, <S%H3220><s%> north, <S%H6828><s%> and south. <S%H5045><s%>

And their relatives <S%H251><s%> in their villages <S%H9161><s%> [were] to come <S%H935><s%> in every seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> from time <S%H6256><s%> to time <S%H6256><s%> [to be] with them;

for the four <S%H702><s%> chief <S%H5057><s%> gatekeepers <S%H7778><s%> who <S%H1992><s%> [were] Levites, <S%H3881><s%> were in an office of trust, <S%H530><s%> and were over <S%H5921><s%> the chambers <S%H3957><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> the treasuries <S%H214><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of God. <S%H430><s%>

And they spent <S%H3885><s%> the night <S%H3885><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> the watch <S%H4931><s%> was committed <S%H5921><s%> to them; and they [were] in charge <S%H5921><s%> of opening <S%H4668><s%> [it] morning <S%H1242><s%> by morning. <S%H1242><s%>

Now some <S%H4480><s%> of them had charge <S%H5921><s%> of the utensils <S%H3627><s%> of service, <S%H5656><s%> for they counted <S%H4557><s%> them when they brought <S%H935><s%> them in and when they took <S%H3318><s%> them out.

Some <S%H4480><s%> of them also were appointed <S%H4487><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the furniture <S%H3627><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the utensils <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> and over <S%H5921><s%> the fine <S%H5560><s%> flour <S%H5560><s%> and the wine <S%H3196><s%> and the oil <S%H8081><s%> and the frankincense <S%H3828><s%> and the spices. <S%H1314><s%>
And some <S%H4480><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> prepared <S%H7543><s%> the mixing <S%H4842><s%> of the spices. <S%H1314><s%>

And Mattithiah, <S%H4993><s%> one of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> who <S%H1931><s%> was the first-born of Shallum <S%H7967><s%> the Korahite, <S%H7145><s%> had the responsibility <S%H530><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the things <S%H4639><s%> which were baked <S%H2281><s%> in pans. <S%H2281><s%>

And some <S%H4480><s%> of their relatives <S%H251><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> [were] over <S%H5921><s%> the showbread <S%H3899><s%> <S%H4635><s%> to prepare <S%H3559><s%> it every <S%H7676><s%> sabbath. <S%H7676><s%>

Now these <S%H428><s%> are the singers, <S%H7891><s%> heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers' [households] of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> [who lived] in the chambers <S%H3957><s%> [of the temple] free <S%H6362><s%> [from other service;] for they were engaged <S%H5921><s%> in their work <S%H4399><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night. <S%H3915><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> were heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers' [households] of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> according to their generations, <S%H8435><s%> chief <S%H7218><s%> men, <S%H7218><s%> who <S%H428><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>
And in Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> Jeiel <S%H3262><s%> the father of Gibeon <S%H1><s%> lived, <S%H1391><s%> and his wife's name <S%H3427><s%> was Maacah, <S%H8034><s%>
and his first-born son <S%H1121><s%> [was] Abdon, <S%H5658><s%> then Zur, <S%H6698><s%> Kish, <S%H7027><s%> Baal, <S%H9058><s%> Ner, <S%H5369><s%> Nadab, <S%H5070><s%>
Gedor, <S%H1446><s%> Ahio, <S%H283><s%> Zechariah, <S%H2148><s%> and Mikloth. <S%H4732><s%>

And Mikloth <S%H4732><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Shimeam. <S%H8043><s%> And they also <S%H637><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> with their relatives <S%H251><s%> in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> opposite <S%H5048><s%> their [other] relatives. <S%H251><s%>

And Ner <S%H5369><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Kish, <S%H7027><s%> and Kish <S%H7027><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Saul, <S%H7586><s%> and Saul <S%H7586><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jonathan, <S%H3083><s%> Malchi-shua, Abinadab, <S%H41><s%> and Eshbaal. <S%H792><s%>
And the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> [was] Merib-baal; and Merib-baal became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Micah. <S%H4318><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Micah <S%H4318><s%> [were] Pithon, <S%H6377><s%> Melech, <S%H4429><s%> Tahrea, <S%H8475><s%> [and Ahaz.]

And Ahaz <S%H271><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jarah, <S%H3294><s%> and Jarah <S%H3294><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Alemeth, <S%H5964><s%> Azmaveth, <S%H5820><s%> and Zimri; <S%H2174><s%> and Zimri <S%H2174><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Moza, <S%H4162><s%>

and Moza <S%H4162><s%> became <S%H3205><s%> the father <S%H3205><s%> of Binea <S%H1150><s%> and Rephaiah <S%H7509><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Eleasah <S%H501><s%> his son, <S%H1121><s%> Azel <S%H682><s%> his son. <S%H1121><s%>

And Azel <S%H682><s%> had six <S%H8337><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> whose names <S%H8034><s%> are these: <S%H428><s%> Azrikam, <S%H5840><s%> Bocheru <S%H1074><s%> and Ishmael <S%H3458><s%> and Sheariah <S%H8187><s%> and Obadiah <S%H5662><s%> and Hanan. <S%H2605><s%> These <S%H428><s%> were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Azel. <S%H682><s%>
